job.title: Software Development Engineer In Test - Windows
job.description: pstrongCome to Seattle WA to Help Build Public Safety Solutions with ComtechstrongppTo learn more about Comtech TelecommunicationsnbspstrongCMTLstrong visit our website atnbspwwwComtech911comppYou can see the big picture and get excited about developing and maintaining applications that support emergency 911 E911 systems You also crave an opportunity to work with the best and brightest software development teams in an environment that is rewarding and collaborativeppnbspppstrongYour New OpportunitystrongppInitially you will be working with worldclass software test engineers to learn about the E911 domain and Comtechs E911 solutions You will create automated test scripts and utilize your scriptingprograming skills in WINDOWS environment You will implement automation for E911 solution applications to be tested against new requirements You will be testing all E911 solutions by simulating call traffic in a test lab Eventually as a Software Development Engineer in Test you will be able to identify innovative approaches for test automation that will boost productivity in functional test as well as performance test Your position will be vital for the success of Comtechs software solutions related to E911 calls nationwideppnbspppstrongAS AN SDET  YOU WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING EXPEIRENCESKILLSEDUCATIONstrongpulliProfessional experience as Automation
